column3: 1. My overall experience with The Fresh Connection was positive.
column4: 2. The simulation helped me understand sustainability concepts effectively.
column5: 3. The experience gave me new perspectives on international supply chains.
column6: 4. I did or could develop valuable skills through participating in the game.
column7: 5. The technical aspects (e.g., platform functionality, access, etc.) were easy to navigate.
column8:
The next question relates to the use of The Fresh Connection game with the International Supply Chain Management 1 (ISCM1) Course.

I find the use of TFC game useful in my learning journey in the International Supply Chain Management 1 class.
column9: I understand better the topics or concepts (Supply chain, Source, Make, Deliver, Customer Service) discussed in ISCM1 class using The Fresh Connection game.
column10: I believe that the TFC game should be used by future students taking ISCM1 class.
